name: Purple News iOS App - Community
description:
Purple News - iOS News and Magazine App


Modern design, compliant with iOS guidelines. Also ready to be coded with all pages and components.

It has 50+ pixel-perfect screens. Moreover, every screen has a dark mode (Total 106 screens). Easy to use and designed with modern techniques.


  • 50+ unique screens (FREE on Gumroad)
  • Dark & Light mode
  • All components are named, sorted, and organized
  • The design complies with iOS guidelines
  • Screens flowchart
  • Free style guide
  • Fonts included
  • Global colors and fonts
